___variant.description: determines the behavior of the git tagger. Valid variants are `Tags` (default): use git tags or fall back to abbreviated commit hash. `CommitSha`: use the full git commit sha. `AbbrevCommitSha`: use the abbreviated git commit sha. `TreeSha`: use the full tree hash of the artifact workingdir. `AbbrevTreeSha`: use the abbreviated tree hash of the artifact workingdir.

AbbrevTreeSha: use the abbreviated tree hash of the artifact workingdir.

___variant.description: determines the behavior of the git tagger. Valid variants are `Tags` (default): use git tags or fall back to abbreviated commit hash. `CommitSha`: use the full git commit sha. `AbbrevCommitSha`: use the abbreviated git commit sha. `TreeSha`: use the full tree hash of the artifact workingdir. `AbbrevTreeSha`: use the abbreviated tree hash of the artifact workingdir.
